title: Key Lawmakers Wary of TikTok Deal Trump Administration Preparing
description: Lawmakers who pressed for the ban on the social media app TikTok expressed doubts about a deal the Trump administration is preparing for outside investors to acquire a half-interest in the Chinese company’s US operations.

title: China Tells Companies to Stop Buying Nvidia Chip With AI Uses
description: China’s cyberspace regulator has instructed companies including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. to halt orders for Nvidia Corp.’s RTX Pro 6000D, a semiconductor for workstations that can be repurposed for artificial-intelligence applications.

title: Winklevoss’ Gemini Space Station Slumps Below IPO Price
description: Gemini Space Station Inc. shares extended declines Wednesday to fall below its initial offering price within days of debuting as a public company in the US, tracking some cryptocurrency-related stocks lower.
